LanguageData.AdrenalBooster_CP.label: adrenal booster
LanguageData.AdrenalBooster_CP.description: An artificial gland which releases adrenal hormones on command.
LanguageData.EnhancedAntibodies_CP.label: enhanced antibodies
LanguageData.EnhancedAntibodies_CP.description: These are tailored antibodies capable of attacking the most powerful viruses.
LanguageData.Nanosurgeons_CP.label: nanosurgeons
LanguageData.Nanosurgeons_CP.description: These are microscopic machines adapted to surgical repair. Some seal off damaged blood vessels, while others repair damaged tissue, cartilage and bone with polymer microstitches. This effectively doubles healing rate.
LanguageData.ToxinBinders_CP.label: toxin binders
LanguageData.ToxinBinders_CP.description: These are nanoids designed to bond with body toxins and poisons.
